Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Yan implied he might be coming back 
this summer.  I think in respect for 
him someone (who is FAR more capable 
than me) should post for Zardus as the 
leader of the Alliance in the restart 
until he returns.  Do you agree? 

  o Yes 
  o No 
  o should ask Yan, but yes if he aproves We it would be a good idea 
  o it's a dumb idea, but I guess we should ask Yan 
  o I don't know who Yan is 
  o SHUTUP DEWY NOONE LIKES YOU AND PROPOSALS LIKE THAT ARE SUPPOSE TO BE MAD BY THE POPULAR ONG TIMEMEMBERS! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
